name: LRPreferenceLinkSDK
summary: PreferenceLink provides compliant means to enable consent and preference management beyond first- and third-party cookie restrictions.
description: PreferenceLink connects an individualâ€™s preference and consent choices across devices and allows you to centrally manage all consent data to unify disparate processes for auditing, tracking, and disseminating the consent and preferences of an individual across ID spaces. With PreferenceLink you can generate, store and retrieve consent and preference information from a user based on a deterministic identifier provided by you. This means compliant consent management with a user-friendly experience and interface across all your environments.
